description: In race_results, retirements are indicated by time = 'DNF'. The position column rarely uses 'Ret'; DNFs often have position = 'NC' or even a numeric value. To count retirements (DNFs), filter on time = 'DNF' rather than position.
example:
-- Count DNFs in 2020
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM race_results WHERE year = 2020 AND time = 'DNF';
